Module gmit.software
Package ie.gmit.sw.models

Class Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.models.Sprite
      • ie.gmit.sw.models.Knight
  • public class Knight
extends Sprite
    Represents a Knight object which inherits the functionality of Sprite.
    Author:
    Gary Connlly

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Knight​(java.lang.String name, Point p)
      Creates a Knight object using a name and a Point object passed as parameters.
      Knight​(java.lang.String name, Point p, java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] img)
      Creates a Knight object using a name, a Point, and an image array object passed as parameters.
